meaningMnemonic: You've seen 聞く by now hopefully. This is similar, but instead of meaning "to hear" it means <vocabulary>hearable</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>to be audible</vocabulary>). Just think about that こえ hanging off there as the voice you can hear.
readingMnemonic: The reading comes from 聞く, so if you know the reading of that word, you can apply it here.
